name: complicatedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is difficult to understand because it involves a lot of different things: The characters in the play are all richly and complicatedly human. He is so complicatedly rich that it is impossible to calculate his total wealth.
More examplesFewer examplesMy feelings were so complicatedly tangled up that I found it hard to express them.Rather complicatedly, the female characters pretend that they are really men dressed as women.When she heard the news, she felt strangely and complicatedly angry.
